text: fay shay' ymnehm min al'iiman biallah walyawm alakhir baed ma wuddiht lahum alayat? wama lahum 'iidha quri ealayhim alquran la yasjudun llh, wala ysllimun bima ja' fyh? 'iinama sjyt aladhin kafaruu altkdhyb wmkhalft alhq. wallah 'aelam bima yaktumun fi sudurihim min alenad mae eilmuhum bi'ana ma ja' bih alquran hq, fabashirhum -ayha alrswl- bi'ana allh- eaza wjl- qad aedd lahum edhabana mwjeana, lkn aladhin amanuu biallah warasulih waddawa ma frdh allah elyhm, lahum 'ajr fi alakhirat ghyr maqtue wala mnqws
